name: Allosaurus
description: The Allosaurus is a Huge beast characterized by its massive body, sharp claws, and powerful jaws, serving as a terror on the battlefield.
memorable: It excels at physical combat with its high strength and dexterity, allowing it to deal significant damage in melee encounters.
goals: Hunt and overpower prey while asserting dominance in its territory.
relations: Often encountered alongside other predatory creatures.
environment: Typically found in wild, open territories such as forests and plains.
strengths: Impressive physical stats enhance its melee attack capabilities.
weaknesses: Low intelligence makes it susceptible to strategic tactics.
attacks: Primary attack is a powerful Bite that deals significant piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Has the Pounce ability, allowing it to knock enemies prone when moving at speed before the attack.
senses: Possesses keen hearing and a passive perception of 15.
skills: Proficient in perception, exhibiting average perceptive abilities.
additional_information: Can knock targets prone with a successful claw attack.
Benefits from increased attack rolls if charging towards its target.
Represents a fierce predator in settings, often inducing fear in lesser creatures.
Typically hunts in packs but can also be solitary when stalking larger prey.
Adaptable to various terrains, making it a versatile threat.
